TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Binder.unmarshal - Binder.marshal
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Compile a simple schema to create a java binding classes. Test an available implementation of the jakarta.xml.bind.Binder marshal/unmarshal methods.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node)
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) unmarshals XML data from the DOM tree and return the resulting content tree. unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) returns a non null object. The validation is switched off by default.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) - with validation
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) unmarshals XML data from the DOM tree and return the resulting content tree. unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) returns a non null object. The validation is switched on.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) - invalid data
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) unmarshals XML data from the DOM tree. The DOM tree is invalid. The vaildation is switched on. Registered validation event handler always returns true. unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Node) does not throw exception, returns a non-null object.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseDocumentation.Description: This method throws UnmarshalException when the Binder's JAXBContext does not have a mapping for the XML element name or the type, specifiable via @xsi:type, of xmlNode to a JAXB mapped class.
Throws: IllegalArgumentException - If the node parameter is null
When getSchema() is non-null, xmlNode and its descendants is validated during this operation.
Unmarshal XML root element by provided declaredType to a JAXB object tree.
Throws: IllegalArgumentException - If any of the input parameters are null
When getSchema() is non-null, xmlNode and its descendants is validated during this operation.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.marshal(java.lang.Object,org.w3c.dom.Node)
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.marshal(java.lang.Object,org.w3c.dom.Node) marshals an Object data to a DOM tree. marshal(java.lang.Object,org.w3c.dom.Node) does not throw exception, resulting DOM is checked.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.marshal(java.lang.Object,org.w3c.dom.Node) - jaxb object is null
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.marshal(java.lang.Object jaxbObject,org.w3c.dom.Node node) throws an IllegalArgumentException if jaxbObject parameter is null.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.marshal(java.lang.Object,org.w3c.dom.Node) - node is null
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that Binder{org.w3c.dom.Node}.marshal(java.lang.Object jaxbObject,org.w3c.dom.Node node) throws an IllegalArgumentException if node parameter is null.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev
